BauV.name: Bauarbeiterschutzverordnung
BauV.description: Regulation concerning the protection of construction workers. Covers specific safety requirements for construction sites and construction work, aiming to prevent accidents and health hazards in the construction industry. Includes provisions on scaffolding, excavation, demolition, and other construction-related activities.

ESV 2012.name: Elektroschutzverordnung 2012 (Electrical Safety Regulation 2012)
ESV 2012.description: Regulation regarding safety requirements for electrical work activities. Covers requirements for qualified electricians (Elektrofachkraft), safety procedures, and protective equipment for work on electrical installations.

PSA-V.name: Verordnung über den Schutz der Arbeitnehmer/innen vor Gefahren durch physikalische Einwirkungen

VbA.name: Verordnung über den Schutz der Arbeitnehmer vor Gefahren durch chemische Arbeitsstoffe (VbA)
VbA.description: Sets out specific requirements for protecting employees from risks associated with hazardous chemical agents in the workplace, including classification, labeling, risk assessment, and control measures.

BauKG.name: Bauarbeitenkoordinationsgesetz - BauKG
BauKG.description: Federal Act on the coordination of occupational safety and health protection on construction sites. Contains 20 sections (§§ 1-20) covering coordination duties, safety planning, and responsibilities on construction sites.

GefStoffV.name: Verordnung der Bundesministerin für Arbeit, Soziales und Konsumentenschutz über den Schutz der Arbeitnehmer/innen vor Gefahren durch chemische Arbeitsstoffe (Gefahrstoffverordnung 2001 – GefStoffV 2001)

LärmV.name: Lärm- und Vibrations-Arbeitnehmerschutzverordnung
LärmV.description: Regulates the protection of employees from risks arising from exposure to noise and mechanical vibrations at the workplace, setting exposure limits and requiring protective measures.

VbAV.name: Verordnung über die Sicherheits- und Gesundheitsschutzdokumente
VbAV.description: Specifies the content and structure requirements for safety and health protection documents, which are essential for systematic workplace safety management and risk assessment documentation.

AUVA M.plus 330.name: AUVA M.plus 330 - Arbeitsstätten - Anforderungen
AUVA M.plus 330.description: AUVA safety publication on workplace requirements. Covers general requirements for workplaces including ventilation, lighting, temperature, and ergonomic design.

AUVA M.plus 910.name: AUVA M.plus 910 - Lärm am Arbeitsplatz
AUVA M.plus 910.description: AUVA safety publication on noise protection at the workplace. Covers noise assessment, hearing protection, and technical noise reduction measures.

AUVA M.plus 340.name: AUVA M.plus 340 - Brandschutz
AUVA M.plus 340.description: AUVA safety publication on fire protection. Covers fire prevention, fire extinguishing equipment, evacuation procedures, and emergency planning.

AUVA M.plus 350.name: AUVA M.plus 350 - Elektrische Anlagen
AUVA M.plus 350.description: AUVA safety publication on electrical installations. Covers electrical safety requirements, testing procedures, and protection against electrical hazards.

PGS.name: Publicatiereeks Gevaarlijke Stoffen (Publication Series Hazardous Substances)
PGS.description: PGS isn't a law, but a series of publications containing detailed safety requirements for the storage and handling of specific hazardous substances. These requirements are often referred to in permits and are considered best practices, thus functioning as de facto regulations. While the website hosts all PGS guidelines, accessing the specific ones relevant to workplace safety is very helpful and is considered part of the 'Arbo' rules, indirectly. The direct link leads to the overview page of all available PGS guides.

WOR.name: Wet op de ondernemingsraden
WOR.description: Regulates the establishment and functioning of works councils (ondernemingsraden), which have significant rights and duties regarding workplace safety and health policies, employee well-being, and working conditions within a company.

BW Boek 7 Titel 10.name: Burgerlijk Wetboek Boek 7, Titel 10 (Arbeidsovereenkomst)
BW Boek 7 Titel 10.description: Contains fundamental provisions regarding the employment contract, including the employer's general duty of care for the safety and health of employees (e.g., Article 7:658 BW), which forms the civil law basis for workplace safety obligations.

WED.name: Wet op de economische delicten
WED.description: This act defines economic offenses, including violations of workplace safety and health legislation (like the Arbowet), and outlines the investigative and enforcement powers of authorities such as the Inspectie SZW.

WAZO.name: Wet arbeid en zorg
WAZO.description: While primarily regulating leave arrangements, this act contains crucial provisions for the protection of specific worker groups, such as pregnant and breastfeeding employees, directly impacting their health and safety at the workplace.

UAVG.name: Uitvoeringswet Algemene verordening gegevensbescherming
UAVG.description: This implementing act for the GDPR in the Netherlands includes specific rules for processing sensitive personal data, such as health data, in the employment context, which is highly relevant for occupational health services, accident reporting, and overall workplace health management.

PGS 15.name: PGS 15 - Opslag van verpakte gevaarlijke stoffen
PGS 15.description: Publication Series Hazardous Substances 15 - Storage of packaged hazardous substances. Contains detailed requirements for safe storage of hazardous materials in warehouses.

AI-13.name: AI-13 Fysieke Belasting
AI-13.description: Dutch Labour Inspectorate publication on physical workload. Covers manual handling, lifting, repetitive work, and ergonomic requirements.

AI-15.name: AI-15 Machineveiligheid
AI-15.description: Dutch Labour Inspectorate publication on machine safety. Covers CE marking, machine guards, safety devices, and maintenance requirements.

AI-19.name: AI-19 Gevaarlijke Stoffen
AI-19.description: Dutch Labour Inspectorate publication on hazardous substances. Covers exposure limits, risk assessment, and protective measures for chemical hazards.

DGUV Vorschrift 1.name: DGUV Vorschrift 1 - Grundsätze der Prävention
DGUV Vorschrift 1.description: Fundamental principles of prevention for occupational safety and health in Germany. Covers employer and employee obligations, risk assessment, and prevention organization.

BildscharbV.name: Bildschirmarbeitsverordnung (repealed - now in ArbStättV Anhang 6)
BildscharbV.description: The Bildschirmarbeitsverordnung was repealed in 2016. Its contents were transferred to Appendix 6 (Anhang 6) of the Arbeitsstättenverordnung (ArbStättV). Since July 2024, ASR A6 'Bildschirmarbeit' provides additional technical specifications.

TRBS 1111.name: TRBS 1111 - Gefährdungsbeurteilung
TRBS 1111.description: Technical Rule for Industrial Safety - Risk assessment requirements for work equipment and hazardous substances.

TRBS 1201.name: TRBS 1201 - Prüfungen von Arbeitsmitteln
TRBS 1201.description: Technical Rule for Industrial Safety - Testing requirements for work equipment and installations.

TRBS 2121.name: TRBS 2121 - Gefährdung von Beschäftigten durch Absturz
TRBS 2121.description: Technical Rule for Industrial Safety - Protection against falling from heights. Covers scaffolding, ladders, and fall protection.

TRGS 400.name: TRGS 400 - Gefährdungsbeurteilung für Tätigkeiten mit Gefahrstoffen
TRGS 400.description: Technical Rule for Hazardous Substances - Risk assessment for activities involving hazardous substances.

TRGS 510.name: TRGS 510 - Lagerung von Gefahrstoffen in ortsbeweglichen Behältern
TRGS 510.description: Technical Rule for Hazardous Substances - Storage of hazardous substances in portable containers.

ASR A1.3.name: ASR A1.3 - Sicherheits- und Gesundheitsschutzkennzeichnung
ASR A1.3.description: Workplace Rule - Safety and health protection signage requirements.

ASR A2.2.name: ASR A2.2 - Maßnahmen gegen Brände
ASR A2.2.description: Workplace Rule - Fire prevention measures and fire extinguisher requirements.

MuSchG.name: Gesetz zum Schutz von Müttern bei der Arbeit, in der Ausbildung und im Studium

JArbSchG.name: Gesetz zum Schutz der arbeitenden Jugend

LärmVibrationsArbSchV.name: Lärm- und Vibrations-Arbeitsschutzverordnung
LärmVibrationsArbSchV.description: This ordinance regulates the protection of employees from health risks due to noise and vibration at work, setting out requirements for risk assessment, exposure limits, and protective measures.

BioStoffV.name: Biostoffverordnung
BioStoffV.description: This ordinance specifies measures for the protection of employees from health risks due to biological agents (e.g., bacteria, viruses, fungi) at work, including risk assessment, classification, and containment.

ArbMedVV.name: Verordnung zur arbeitsmedizinischen Vorsorge (Arbeitsmedizinische Vorsorgeverordnung)
ArbMedVV.description: Specifies the requirements for occupational medical prevention, including mandatory, offered, and voluntary check-ups for employees exposed to specific hazards.

LastenhandhabV.name: Verordnung über Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz bei der manuellen Handhabung von Lasten bei der Arbeit (Lastenhandhabungsverordnung - LasthandhabV)
